VersionOne IntelliJ IDEA Plugin User Guide
Description
The VersionOne IjtelliJ Idea Plugin (V1IntelliJPlugIn) provides direct interaction with development task in VersionOne from within the IntelliJ IDEA IDE. This enables Java developers to update VersionOne task status, estimates, remaining effort, etc., without leaving the confines of the Eclipse environment.
System Requirements
VersionOne: 7.3 or above
Client Workstation:
IDE—Tested with IntelliJ IDEA 8.0

Usage
&name; contributes two new Views to the IntelliJ IDEA environment. Task View
Tasks Window
Details View
Details Window
Selecting Projects
In order to view VersionOne Task you must first select a Project. To select a Project clicking the Filter icon located on the left side of the Task View tool bar.
Projects Window
To choose a specific project to work on, simply navigate the tree and select it. Once selected, click OK to exit. Note that this filter dialog also supports an "Show All Tasks" checkbox. When you select this option you will see all task in the active iteration not just the task where you are the owner.
Updating Tasks
Once you’ve selected a project your Task view will refresh and list all VersionOne task to which you are assigned. To update a task, modify the attribute directly in the grid. Once you’re finished updating a Task, click the Save icon to update the task in VersionOne.
